attributes.action: All MP's must of worked in the private sector for a minimum of 10years before being aloud to run an economy & too pass basic questions in economics.
attributes.additional_details: As many people in the UK are beginning to realise just how bad the UK economy has become. MP's should have to work in the private sector for a minimum of 10years to gain the social skills found in the private sector or of worked in the MOD. Also MP's should have to pass basic tests in economics before standing as an MP too. Basic tests in economics should be taken yearly to keep up with the modern times & the monetary system.
